page.title: 12TWO RESIDENTS (2)
page.content:
Orchard View and Pethertons. She says she doesn't know where residents used to live before these came. All in all she thinks the changes have made Halberton a nicer place to live in.
{AN INTERVIEW WITH MR. SALTER
Salters Stores in Willand has been there 70 years.We decided to interview the owner. The original shop has been extended twice.Mr Salter added a cash and carry and a store room.The biggest and most important change for him was the industrial site being built and then all the new houses. This increased business and helped him a lot.In his lifetime the village has grown 10 times bigger.The opening of the big stores in Tiverton did affect business at first but now it is beginning to come back.
